channel.title: Project parts on Martha Lucia Borras Guevara, Vladimir Finkelshtein, Sandro Mignuzzi and Anzhela Shestakova
channel.description: Recent content in Project parts on Martha Lucia Borras Guevara, Vladimir Finkelshtein, Sandro Mignuzzi and Anzhela Shestakova

item.title: Part 1: Preparing and cleaning of the data
item.description: Preparing a dataset will usually require some manipulation and adaptation before any kind of analyses con be performed, especially if you need to aggregate other sources of data for the analysis. Step 1: Data Preparation - Began with finding the right data from different sources provided by the company. Step 2: Discovering ans assesment - This step was about getting to know the data and understanding what had to be done before any analyses were done.

item.title: Part 2: Development of the recommendation engine
item.description: An implicit recommendation system was used to increase market share growth for Crane. This system is a subclass of information filtering strategy that seeks to predict a contractor’s preferences for a given product. Higher preference predictons will result in a recommendation. Step 1: Data Preparation - Began with finding the right data from different sources provided by the company. Step 2: Discovering ans assesment - This step was about getting to know the data and understanding what had to be done before any analyses were done.

item.title: Part 3: Recommendation engine integration with Qlikview
item.description: A major part of this project’s scope was to integrate our python code and models into the existing Crane BS analytics environment, which is hosted on the analytics platform QlikView. You can find a step by step guide here.
